channel.title: [HELP] How do i make this Frame happen [HELP]
channel.description:
how do i make a frame like this pop up Note - its not : SendQuest SendFrame
[IMG]http://i88.photobucket.com/albums/k193/jake1216_2006/congratsquestdone.gif[/img] its the frame when you beat a quest

item.title: [HELP] How do i make this Frame happen [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

From a Regular P16 V6 server:

public void showQuestCompleted(String questName, int rewardqp) {
                totalqp += rewardqp;
		showInterface(297);
		sendQuest("Congratulations!", 299);
		sendQuest("Close Window", 300);
		sendQuest("You are awarded", 6156);
		sendQuest("Earned QP:", 6158);
		sendQuest("Total QP:", 303);
		sendQuest("You have completed "+questName, 301);
		sendQuest(""+rewardqp, 4444);
		sendQuest(""+totalqp, 304);
	}

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] How do i make this Frame happen [HELP]
